definition: sequence of movements in martial arts/routine/pattern/standard method

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: Film-goers and television-watchers know and appreciate the format.
sentences.chinese: 看电影和电视的人都了解并且喜欢这个套路。

sentences.english: It is one kind of traditional long weapon routines in Eight Diagrams School.
sentences.chinese: 八卦滚手刀是八卦掌门传统长兵器套路之一。

sentences.english: Do Katas Help You Defend Yourself or Improve Fighting Skills?
sentences.chinese: 套路有助于自卫还是能改善战斗技能？

sentences.english: The grampian no, completely is Hollywood like routines.
sentences.chinese: 历史的厚重感没有，完全是好莱坞似的套路。

sentences.english: The reform of having the Chinese meals in a western way, is only emphasizing in the aspects of health and sanitation.
sentences.chinese: 中餐西吃的改革，也只是按体学套路从卫生角度着力。

sentences.english: The most essential charm of Wushu is the consistency of Wushu and Dance.
sentences.chinese: 舞与武的一体性，是武术套路最根本的魅力所在。

sentences.english: Chum Kiu is a middle rank routine of Wing Chun.
sentences.chinese: 寻桥是咏春拳的中级套路。

sentences.english: Practice attacking and defending. The whole routine is made up of thirteen steps.
sentences.chinese: 整个套路十三步由十三个摇法的动作组成。

sentences.english: Stott Pilates uses the neutral spine position in exercise routines.
sentences.chinese: 斯托特普拉提练习套路中使用中立的立场脊柱。

sentences.english: The Chinese shadow boxing is the universal, popularized set pattern after the validation of national Wushu authority.
sentences.chinese: 此拳术是经过国家武术权威机构审定的普及推广套路。

sentences.english: Did you practice this at training?
sentences.chinese: 你们在训练中练过这个套路吗？

sentences.english: The interview topic was on skill sets for academic success.
sentences.chinese: 这次的采访内容是关于取得学术性成功的技巧套路。

sentences.english: Example of Value of Degree of Difficulty of Changquan.
sentences.chinese: 第二套国际武术竞赛套路长拳难度分值个案。

sentences.english: This is the way science welcomes newcomers.
sentences.chinese: 这就是科学迎接新人的套路。

sentences.english: Shao-lin unique er-zhi-zen is the representative of hawk's claw.
sentences.chinese: 少林绝技二指禅是少林鹰派武术的代表性套路。

sentences.english: Some suggestions are offered to apply this method to the teaching of other carte and tierce repertoire extensively.
sentences.chinese: 综合教学法也适用于其它剑术套路的教学。

many superficial changes but no departure from the original stand (idiom); plus ça change, plus ça reste la mème chose
pinyin: wan4 bian4 bu4 li2 qi2 zong1

definition: different broth but the same old medicine (idiom); a change in name only/a change in form but not in substance
to counter every move/to be full of tricks
